news.content:
We are now ready to invite a limited group from our community to test an early release of Grid 3.0!

If youâ€™re interested, please read through this post and answer three quick questions for us.
news.excerpt: We are now ready to invite a limited group from our community to test an early release of Grid 3.0!

previous.title: Another Grid Enhancement Proposal is Live

next.title: What's Possible on Grid 2
next.excerpt: While we work to open testing of Grid 3.0, we wanted to outline what's already available to test on Grid 2.
